member.name: EXCEPTION_POINTERS
member.summary: Contains an exception record with a machine-independent description of an exception and a context record with a machine-dependent description of the processor context at the time of the exception.

member.name: EXCEPTION_POINTERS.ExceptionRecord
member.summary: A pointer to an structure that contains a machine-independent description of the exception.

member.name: EXCEPTION_POINTERS.ContextRecord
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that contains a processor-specific description of the state of the processor at the time of the exception.
